mapper.select: select user_id, pwd, user_name, mobile, email, birth, in_date, up_date, in_user_id, up_user_id from suser where user_id=:1
select user_id, pwd, user_name, mobile, email, birth, in_date, up_date, in_user_id, up_user_id from suser where user_id=:1 and pwd=:2
select user_id, pwd, user_name, mobile, email, birth, in_date, up_date, in_user_id, up_user_id from suser order by 1 desc
mapper.update: insert into suser ( user_id, pwd, user_name, mobile, email, birth, in_date, up_date, in_user_id, up_user_id ) values ( :1, :2, :3, :4, :5, :6, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :7, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :8)
update suser set pwd=:1, user_name=:2, mobile=:3, email=:4, birth=:5, up_date=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), up_user_id=:6 where user_id=:7
